thread.section_title: Wiggle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle | wiggle.com.au
thread.title: Kate

author: Kate
title: Kate
text: I've only ever had great experiences with Wiggle. They offer a fantastic of products at competitive prices. The shipping is fast and quite often free if you spend enough. On the rare occasion that I've needed to return an item, it has been such an easy process and I've been really happy with getting either a refund or a different product. I can honestly say I've only had good experiences with Wiggle.
